overview.en: 中国红客联盟成员组建开发新时代区块链社交钱包，推动区块链更快的发展，将应用的各个领域用于快速支付通道，打造新联盟。
overview.zh: Members of the China Red Guest Alliance formed and developed a new era of blockchain social wallets to promote the faster development of the blockchain, using all areas of the application for rapid payment channels and creating new alliances.
